string.name: array_type_update
string.value: Update a single element in an array

string.name: array_type_deletetoast
string.value: The list is empty and cannot be deleted！

string.name: array_type_updatetoast
string.value: The list is empty and cannot be update！

string.name: only_update_bound_components
string.value: Only the components to which you are bound are updated

string.name: update_title_content
string.value: Click to modify the title and content

string.name: update_the_custom_component
string.value: Where the custom component is updated

string.name: parent_child_sync
string.value: State synchronization between parent and child components

string.name: uni_and_bidirection_sync_tips
string.value: The prototype color in the parent component is @ state state state variable

string.name: single_direction_sync_tips
string.value: The prototype color in the one-way synchronization sub-component is @Prop state variable

string.name: both_direction_sync_tips
string.value: The prototype color in the bidirectional synchronization sub-component is @Link state variable

string.name: uni_and_bidirection_sync_btn
string.value: Set to pink, components are updated synchronously

string.name: single_direction_sync_btn
string.value: Set to blue, parent component is out of sync

string.name: partial_sync
string.value: The child component synchronizes parts of the parent component

string.name: partial_sync_parent_tips
string.value: The array in the parent component is a @State state variable, and the classes of the elements of the array are decorated with @observed

string.name: partial_sync_text
string.value: Use @ObjectLink to modify variables in child components to synchronize data with elements of objects in parent components

string.name: parent_descendent_sync
string.value: State synchronization between parent and descendent

string.name: deepnest_parent_titleone
string.value: The circular color in the parent component as @State state variable

string.name: deepnest_child_titleone
string.value: The circular color of the sub-component is @Link, and the state variable is passed to the sub-component

string.name: deepnest_descendent_titleone
string.value: The circle color in the sub-component is @Link status variable

string.name: deepnest_parent_titletwo
string.value: The state variable with the circular color of @Provide in the parent component as the data provider

string.name: deepnest_child_titletwo
string.value: Variables do not need to be set in subcomponents

string.name: deepnest_descendent_titletwo
string.value: The round color in the sub-component is @Consume variable to sense data changes, update the UI, or reverse synchronization

string.name: parent_titleone
string.value: The common parent component circle color is @State variable

string.name: link_brothers_title
string.value: The brother component circle color is @Link state variable

string.name: parent_titletwo
string.value: The common parent component circle color is @Provide variable

string.name: consume_brothers_title
string.value: The brother component circle color is @Consume state variable

string.name: application_storage_ui
string.value: State synchronization between the app storage and the UI

string.name: nightmode_text
string.value: Night mode control Ability1, Ability2 interface style

string.name: both_data_binding
string.value: The component establishes two-way binding with AppStorage through the state variable decorated by @StorageLink(key)

string.name: single_data_binding
string.value: The component establishes a one-way data binding with AppStorage by using the state variable decorated with @StorageProp(key)

string.name: nigntmode_both_binding
string.value: The night mode in this interface is bidirectional synchronization of @StorageLink(key) variable, and the night mode switch will be synchronized in other capabilities

string.name: single_fontsize_binding
string.value: The font size in this interface is the @StorageProp(key) variable one-way synchronization, which only changes the font size of the current interface

string.name: ability_storage_ui
string.value: State synchronization between the ability storage and the UI

string.name: ability_storage_nightmodelsync
string.value: The night mode switch controls the interface style of Page1 and Page2

string.name: ability_storage_fontsizesync
string.value: Font size control page1, page2 interface font size one-way synchronization

string.name: localStorage_both_data_binding
string.value: The component establishes two-way binding with LocalStorage through the state variable decorated by @LocalStorageLink(key)

string.name: localStorage_single_data_binding
string.value: The component establishes a one-way data binding with LocalStorage by using the state variable decorated with @LocalStorageProp(key)

string.name: localStorage_nigntmode_both_binding
string.value: The night mode in this interface is bidirectional synchronization of @LocalStorageLink (key) variable, and the night mode switch will be synchronized in other capabilities

string.name: localStorage_single_fontsize_binding
string.value: The font size in this interface is the @StorageProp(key) variable one-way synchronization, which only changes the font size of the current interface

string.name: enter_ability_outofsync_text
string.value: The data is not synchronized across capabilities, so the switch of night mode and home page in this interface is not synchronized

string.name: base_type_tip_text
string.value: The circle color is a @State state variable
